title: Joan Sutherland in concert
creator_credit: Phillip Booth, Brian J Smith, Western Australian Opera Company and TVW Enterprises
brief_description: Dame Joan Sutherland, “La Stupenda”, accompanied by her husband/arranger and renowned pianist, Richard Bonynge, gives an outstanding performance with a program that is rich and varied from the dramatic to the light-hearted. This full-length recital was recorded at the Perth Concert Hall on 9 March 1982 for television.
